attributes.action: adapt the Blue Badge by having the name of the holder's disability printed on the reverse side where the identifying photograph is so that only either the police or traffic warden will be able to see it.  Also, the Prime Minister should state that only members of the medical profession are to issue the badge and take the control away from local authorities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The name of the doctor and the GP/hospital stamp should be endorsed on the Blue Badge too.  It's about time that something positive was done to eliminate the blatant abuse of this scheme.  Maybe with this extra information on the Badge, it will go someway to making it less easy for fraudulent copies to be made.
